DOC.brief_summary: The study plans to investigate whether recovery of the heart function after acute anterior myocardial infarction is dependent upon improvement in thyroid gland functioning.
DOC.brief_title: Subclinical Hypothyroidism and Acute Anterior Myocardial Infarction: Is it Cardio-protective or Not?
DOC.criteria: Have suffered anterior myocardial infarction Do not receive thyroid treatment No history of ischemic heart disease
